price: Sisi tumekuwekeeni mauti; na wala Sisi hatushindwi
arabic: نَحۡنُ قَدَّرۡنَا بَيۡنَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ
footnotes: Sisi tumekuhukumieni mauti, na tumeweka wakati makhsuri wa kufa kwenu. Na wala Sisi si wenye kushindwa kukubadilisheni sura zenu,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: naḥnu qaddarnā baynakumu al-mawta wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
